2.caption_en:
Two solid blue vertical arrows meet tip-to-tip at the image center: the top arrow points downward and the bottom arrow points upward. 

{
  "type": "icon",
  "shape": "vertical_arrows",
  "count": 2,
  "orientation": "vertical",
  "directions": [
    "down",
    "up"
  ],
  "color": "blue",
  "arrangement": "tip_to_tip_centered",
  "style": "flat_solid",
  "background": "light_gray",
  "position": "centered",
  "relative_size": {
    "width_ratio": 0.15,
    "height_ratio": 0.98
  },
  "edges": "sharp",
  "notes": "symmetrical arrows sharing a central meeting point"
}

3.caption_en:
A four-row layered matrix labeled "Ecosystem Layer", "Engagement Layer", "Intelligence Layer", and "Infrastructure Layer" showing colored square nodes (teal, lime, magenta) and vertical/diagonal connector lines that indicate relationships and flows between layers.

{
  "type": "layered_matrix_diagram",
  "title": null,
  "rows": [
    { "index": 0, "name": "Ecosystem Layer" },
    { "index": 1, "name": "Engagement Layer" },
    { "index": 2, "name": "Intelligence Layer" },
    { "index": 3, "name": "Infrastructure Layer" }
  ],
  "columns": {
    "count_estimate": 6,
    "layout": "vertical swimlanes separated by faint lines"
  },
  "nodes": [
    { "id": "n1", "color": "teal", "layer": "Ecosystem Layer", "position": "center-right" },
    { "id": "n2", "color": "lime", "layer": "Ecosystem Layer", "position": "right" },
    { "id": "n3", "color": "magenta", "layer": "Ecosystem Layer", "position": "far-right" },
    { "id": "n4", "color": "teal", "layer": "Engagement Layer", "position": "center-right" },
    { "id": "n5", "color": "magenta", "layer": "Engagement Layer", "position": "center" },
    { "id": "n6", "color": "lime", "layer": "Engagement Layer", "position": "far-right" },
    { "id": "n7", "color": "lime", "layer": "Intelligence Layer", "position": "center-left" },
    { "id": "n8", "color": "teal", "layer": "Intelligence Layer", "position": "right" },
    { "id": "n9", "color": "magenta", "layer": "Intelligence Layer", "position": "right" },
    { "id": "n10", "color": "lime", "layer": "Infrastructure Layer", "position": "center-left" },
    { "id": "n11", "color": "magenta", "layer": "Infrastructure Layer", "position": "center-left-adjacent" },
    { "id": "n12", "color": "teal", "layer": "Infrastructure Layer", "position": "far-right" }
  ],
  "connections": [
    { "id": "c1", "from": "n1", "to": "n4", "color": "gray", "style": "solid", "orientation": "vertical" },
    { "id": "c2", "from": "n4", "to": "n7", "color": "gray", "style": "solid", "orientation": "diagonal" },
    { "id": "c3", "from": "n2", "to": "n8", "color": "gray", "style": "solid", "orientation": "diagonal" },
    { "id": "c4", "from": "n6", "to": "n8", "color": "gray", "style": "solid", "orientation": "diagonal" },
    { "id": "c5", "from": "n11", "to": "n9", "color": "magenta", "style": "solid", "orientation": "diagonal" },
    { "id": "c6", "from": "n9", "to": "n5", "color": "magenta", "style": "solid", "orientation": "diagonal" },
    { "id": "c7", "from": "n5", "to": "n3", "color": "magenta", "style": "solid", "orientation": "vertical" },
    { "id": "c8", "from": "n8", "to": "n12", "color": "gray", "style": "solid", "orientation": "vertical" }
  ],
  "palette": [
    { "name": "teal", "approx_hex": "#3fb9b7" },
    { "name": "lime", "approx_hex": "#c6d83a" },
    { "name": "magenta", "approx_hex": "#e20073" },
    { "name": "connector_gray", "approx_hex": "#32434a" }
  ],
  "notes": "Approximate node horizontal positions and inferred connections are provided; diagram shows nodes as colored squares with vertical and diagonal connectors indicating cross-layer relationships and flows."
}
